comments:
I got the following NPE when I tried to reimport my binary plugins.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.pde.ui 4 0 Jan 14, 2003 10:13:06.406
!MESSAGE java.lang.NullPointerException
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.localstore.DeleteVisitor.delete

(PluginImportOperation.java:119)

After this error, I tried to delete all the imported binary plugins and I got 
the error: "Internal error: null" and the delete would stop. Refreshing fixed 
the problem.

Created an attachment (id=2973)
patch for core.resources

Added guard against null before deleting from the file system. 

DJ: Please verify and release.

MV: Were your previous external plug-ins imported using links or copy?
Most of them were links but there may have been one or two copies.
